attributes.action: Repeal the handgun ban & liberalise conceal-carry.
attributes.background: The signatories of this petition want to see handguns, rifles & shotguns treated like any other dangerous tool; available to law-abiding citizens in the same way cars are; with licensing & training to all who desire them for self-defence, hunting & collecting purposes. The time has come.

rejection.details:
We understand that you'd like the laws on handguns, rifles and shotguns to be changed, but we're not sure exactly what legal changes you'd like to see.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
